metadata.name: My Sweet Bear, My Dear Daddy ðŸ˜¥
metadata.description:
My Sweet Bear is Gumi. My dad's first gift to me. I love her so much.

My bear reminds me of my father! I lost my father at a young age. I still carry the pain in my heart. 

This teddy bear and this whole story reflect my life story. It's really hard to put a painful event in my life into art!

The completion of this art took 23 days.

"Chiyuri"
